content: उदर्कः [Said to be <ab>fr.</ab> ऋच्] {@--1@} ({%a%}) End, conclusion; °स्वादुनः कर्मणः <ls>Dk. 79</ls>; सुखोदर्कं <ls>K. 328.</ls> ({%b%}) Result, consequence, future result of an action; उदर्कस्तव कल्याणो भविता <ls>Nala. 12. 67</ls>; किंतु कल्याणोदर्कं भविष्यति <ls>U. 4</ls>; प्रयत्नः सफलोदर्क एव <ls>Māl. 8</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 176</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">11. 10</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">9. 25</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">12. 18</ls>; <ls>Pt. 5. 73.</ls> {@--2@} Remote consequence, reward. {@--3@} Future time, futurity. {@--4@} Elevation of a building (as a tower). {@--5@} Surpassing. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of a tree Vanguiera Spinosa Roxb.
